title: 'The Great British Bake Off' Season 9, Episode 8: "Free From Week" | Everything Is Cake
description:
Kate and Amelia discuss their opinions about "Free From Week" (0:30), before diving into a dairy-free ice cream sandwich signature challenge (8:30), vegan sausage roll technical challenge (15:00), and gluten-free celebration cake showstopper challenge (23:35). Then they hand out their awards for the Soggiest Bottom, Best Sound Bites, Best Brit Fit, and much more (41:50).
Hosts: Kate Halliwell and Amelia Wedemeyer
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
